name: Pixel Cube
description:
Pixel Cube is a puzzle game, but with a twist! Touching any walls or obstacles resets your progress. You can't stop moving once you go a direction, so timing your movements is important.

Test your reflexes and puzzle solving in 15 levels (more to come), progressively getting harder in difficulty.

Controls
  • Arrow keys / WASD: Move.
  • Enter: Select option or level.
  • B: Return to level select or menu.
  • T: Play tutorial (in level select).
